title: Kinda Funny vs. The World (Live Action) - Let's Play Live! Trailer (4K)
description:
Get your tickets at http://RoosterTeethLive.com

Use code FUNNY to show that the Best Friends are better than Achievement Hunter, Funhaus, ScrewAttack, and The Creatures! 


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1



Watch the other versions of this video!
Achievement Hunter: https://youtu.be/s_iXOHVcSU8
Funhaus: https://youtu.be/pIUj0CpDn7A
ScrewAttack: https://youtu.be/RGmwsiuVGEQ
The Creatures: https://youtu.be/l5bHEico7dM


Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: where the hell is this Starbucks we've been walking for 45 minutes yeah Nick I thought you said this was a shortcut fantastic was it a shortcut or not okay look who it is kind of lame my well well well if it isn't the Sony **** themselves kind of funny you **** right off creatures hey IGN called they want to know what it's like taking money from children from your **** up apartment I do miss the IGN offices Nick get back over here we've taken enough of your **** creatures this ends right here right now let's dance you want to dance Greg cuz I want a Tango let's do this looks like we got some **** about to fight two bad Achievement Hunters here to kill you all right oh you didn't think you'd have a death battle without ScrewAttack did you or well would you look at this Funhaus we got ourselves LittleNerdConvi you boys playing some D&D sucking each other off what an energy all right before we begin let's go over the rules rule number one do not hurt

at this Funhaus we got ourselves Little Nerd Convention you boys playing some D&D sucking each other off what an energy all right before we begin let's go over the rules rule number one do not hurt anyone's hands we need them to play video games of course and that's it B it ScrewAttack sucks great oh **** it's our mom no no let's play Live at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles June 17th at 7:30 p.m. go to RoosterTeethLive.com and enter code funny
